Secured Loans and Other Banking Services from the BOC Group (other than the BOCHK Holdings Group)

The Group did not enter into any secured loans with the BOC Group (other than the BOCHK Holdings Group) during the year ended 31 December 2017 and no secured loans with BOC Group (other than the BOCHK Hoidings Group) were outstanding as at 31 December 2017.
